mapper.insert: insert into car (carid, brandid, seriesid, cusid, cus_cusid, cus, ccarno, cbrand, cseries, ccolor, cduedate, cyearduedate, cnext, cnextmile, carstatus ) values (#{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cusCusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ccarno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cbrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cseries,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ccolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cduedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cyearduedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cnext,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cnextmile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update car set brandid = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seriesid = #{seriesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cusid = #{cusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_cusid = #{cusCusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus = #{cus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ccarno = #{ccarno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cbrand = #{cbrand,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cseries = #{cseries,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ccolor = #{ccolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cduedate = #{cduedate,jdbcType=DATE}, cyearduedate = #{cyearduedate,jdbcType=DATE}, cnext = #{cnext,jdbcType=DATE}, cnextmile = #{cnextmile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carstatus = #{carstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select carid, brandid, seriesid, cusid, cus_cusid, cus, ccarno, cbrand, cseries, ccolor, cduedate, cyearduedate, cnext, cnextmile, carstatus from car where carid = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select carid, brandid, seriesid, cusid, cus_cusid, cus, ccarno, cbrand, cseries, ccolor, cduedate, cyearduedate, cnext, cnextmile, carstatus from car
